work-item.field:
We will use a combination of a loop and conditions to display all of our family members and we want to know how much people are part of our family.
  • Create a variable $family which should be an array of all family members (parents, brothers, sisters, you)
  • Create a loop which iterates over all family members
  • Display the name of the family member in each iteration
    • If it isn´t the last family member a comma should seperate the names
  • behind the list of names the size of the family should be displayed.
Hint: You can use $velocityCount inside of a foreach loop as count variable (starts with 1 as value) and $family.size() to get the size of the array.
